                                    throws APIException
        Get the list of the groups
        Returns:
        An array of all Group objects
        Throws:
        APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the Group service

      • createGroup

        public Group createGroup​(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String description,
                         java.lang.String mail,
                         java.lang.String logo,
                         java.lang.String picture,
                         java.lang.String creator)
                  throws APIException
        Create one group on the Node JS server
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the group
        type - Type of the group
        description - Description of the group
        mail - Mail of the group
        logo - Logo path of the group
        picture - Picture path of the group
        creator - Creator user which created the group
        Returns:
        The Group object created
        Throws:
        APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the Group service

                         java.lang.String logo,
                         java.lang.String picture,
                         java.lang.String updator)
                  throws APIException
        Update a card in the Node JS server
        Parameters:
        id - Identification number of the group
        name - Name of the group
        type - Type of the group
        description - Description of the group
        mail - Mail of the group
        logo - Logo path of the group
        picture - Picture path of the group
        updator - Updator user which updated the group
        Returns:
        The Group object after the update
        Throws:
        APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the Group service

      • accessAuxiOne

        protected Group accessAuxiOne​(HttpMethod method,
                              java.lang.String http_address,
                              java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> urlParameters)
                       throws APIException
        Get one group
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP method chosen to interact with the server
        http_address - The URL address of the Group service (used for all HTTP method)
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send (used for POST and PUT HTTP methods)
        Returns:
        One Group object
        Throws:
        APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from the Group service
